attributes.action: Reintroduce regulation of bus & train services
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition seeks to reverse the action of a previous government when the public transport of our country was deregulated and our train services sold off to the highest bidder to enable tax cuts to be given to those who didn't need them. It has led to a massive depreciation in public transport and we want to see all public transport returned to public control.

rejection.details: Similar petitions already exist http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/UK-Transport/ & http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/PUBLIC/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
